static paint_chinese_opencv(img, text, left, top, textColor=(0, 255, 0), textSize=20)

Display and add Chinese characters on the image

Parameters

  • img (ndarray) -- Images that need to add Chinese characters.

  • text (str) -- Text to be added.

  • left (int) -- The coordinates of the text, left.

  • top (int) -- The coordinates of the text, top.

  • textColor (tuple) -- Color of text.

  • textSize (int) -- Font size of text.

Returns

Image with text added

Return type

ndarray

static unletterbox(bbox, letterbox_scale)
vis(dets, srcimg, letterbox_scale, fps=None)

Visualize all defect information.

Parameters

  • dets (ndarray) -- Output of the Yolox model.

  • srcimg (ndarray) -- Input image.

  • letterbox_scale (float) -- Scaling ratio.

  • fps -- The fps.

Returns

Image containing defect information.

Return type

res_img(ndarray)

defectdetector.detector.yolox.yolox module

class defectdetector.detector.yolox.yolox.YoloX(modelPath, confThreshold=0.35, nmsThreshold=0.5, objThreshold=0.5, backendId=0, targetId=0)

Bases: object

Load a pre-training Yolox model from ONNX, and make target prediction for the input image.

Parameters

  • modelPath -- Path of the model.

  • confThreshold -- A threshold used to filter boxes by score.

  • nmsThreshold -- A threshold used in non-maximum suppression.

  • backendId -- Specific computation backend supported by network.

  • targetId -- Target identifier of the specific target device used for computations.

generateAnchors()

Generate Anchor coordinates at each stride.

Assign the coordinates at each stride to self.grids. Assign the number of coordinates under each step to self.expanded_strides.

infer(srcimg)

Infer the prediction of the input image from the model and provide classification.

Parameters

srcimg (ndarray) -- Input image of the model.

Returns

Coordinates, classification scores and categories of objectives.

Return type

predictions(ndarray)

property name

Add attribute of classname.

Returns

name of class.

Return type

name(str)

postprocess(outputs)

Get the defect category according to the model output.

Parameters

outputs (ndarray) -- Output of model.

Returns

All objectives and their categories.

Return type

candidates(ndarray)

preprocess(img)

Pre-processing, changing the input dimension.

Parameters

img (ndarray) -- Input image of the model.

Returns

Preprocessed image.

Return type

blob(ndarray)

setBackend(backenId)

Reset backend identifier for self.net.setPreferableBackend.

setTarget(targetId)

Reset target identifier for self.net.setPreferableTarget.

class defectdetector.detector.yolox.YoloX(modelPath, confThreshold=0.35, nmsThreshold=0.5, objThreshold=0.5, backendId=0, targetId=0)

Load a pre-training Yolox model from ONNX, and make target prediction for the input image.

Parameters

  • modelPath -- Path of the model.

  • confThreshold -- A threshold used to filter boxes by score.

  • nmsThreshold -- A threshold used in non-maximum suppression.

  • backendId -- Specific computation backend supported by network.

  • targetId -- Target identifier of the specific target device used for computations.

Generate Anchor coordinates at each stride.

Assign the coordinates at each stride to self.grids. Assign the number of coordinates under each step to self.expanded_strides.
